bottle.name: 2015 Chulengo Chilean Cabernet Reserva
bottle.short_tasting_note: Features flavors of blackberry pie, Damson plum, black cherry, cocoa powder and cassis on the palate, while appetizing tannins provide structure.
bottle.tasting_note: Intense aromas of blackberry pie, damson plums, black cherries, chocolate powder, and cassis. Deeply concentrated, with sweet and mouth-filling tannins. Excellent structure and density with a long, lusturous finish.
